bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for AC Systems
IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for AC Systems
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.63-2005 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.63-1997)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions (for cutout type sectionalizers), ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, constructional requirements, and application considerations for overhead and pad-mounted, dry-vault, and submersible automatic line sectionalizers for ac systems are specified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
